mapper.insert: insert into db_relistitem (SID, OPER, SHOPID, CHECKOPER, OPENFLAG, ITEMID, OPERTIME, SITE, CHECKTIME, ERROR, CHECKDESCR) values (#{sid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{itemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{site,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checktime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{error,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{checkdescr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_relistitem set OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOPID = #{shopid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHECKOPER = #{checkoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ITEMID = #{itemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SITE = #{site,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHECKTIME = #{checktime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ERROR = #{error,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, CHECKDESCR = #{checkdescr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select SID, OPER, SHOPID, CHECKOPER, OPENFLAG, ITEMID, OPERTIME, SITE, CHECKTIME, ERROR, CHECKDESCR from db_relistitem where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select SID, OPER, SHOPID, CHECKOPER, OPENFLAG, ITEMID, OPERTIME, SITE, CHECKTIME, ERROR, CHECKDESCR from db_relistitem
